attributes.action: More financial help to be provided from universal credit to university students
attributes.background: There is no definitive guidance on students and what they are entitled to.  Also income is taken into account when applying for a masters when the finance will be going to tuition fees not to help live. There needs to be more help provided to people who want to get into higher education.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you'd like changes to students' entitlement to Universal Credit, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
